name: Splitify
description: The ultimate tool for bill splitting and group expense management. Minimalist, fast, and completely free. Version 1.3 features improved math logic and smoother transitions.

name: Focus Gem
description: A deep-work timer designed for the monochrome aesthetic. Stay locked in with ambient sounds and a distraction-free UI that melts away.

name: Vault
description: End-to-end encrypted notepad. Your secrets belong to you, and only you. Military-grade encryption meets minimalist design.
